00014 #include <cassert>

00016 
00029 #define EXPECT_EXCEPTION(EXC, CODE) do { \
00030   bool caught = false;                   \
00031   try {                                  \
00032     CODE;                                \
00033   }                                      \
00034   catch (const EXC&) {                   \
00035     caught = true;                       \
00036   }                                      \
00037   assert (caught);                       \
00038 } while(0)
00039 
00040 
00041 #endif // not TESTTOOLS_EXPECT_EXCEPTION_H
